column5: **2012 Ram 4 door Crew Cab included with rental*** Less than 20 minutes and $15 Uber ride to and from Intercontinental Airport!! Upstairs is rented already. Shared kitchen. Great, safe, quiet neighborhood. Convenient access to the Tollroads. My truck does have access to tollroads. Neighbors are awesome as well!! One king size bed in Master, with two air mattresses which fit comfortably in master, as well. The sofa is veeery comfortable as well. Mi casa e su casa!! :)
